column1: '''Robert Giddings''' ([[29 June]] [[1935]] - [[8 March]] [[2012]]<ref>{{webcite|website=Tapper Funeral Services|articleurl=http://www2.tapperfuneralservice.co.uk/FuneralDetails.aspx?FuneralNumber=20120326&Name=Robert_(Lindsay)_Giddings&Dig=yqT/EKPOLEL4p3SJ4YgWq|articlename=In Memory of Robert Giddings|accessed=23 December 2012}}</ref>) was Professor of English at [[Wikipedia:Bournemouth University|Bournemouth University]]
column2: UK. Author and co-author of many works
column3: Giddings also wrote about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>{{webcite|author=Edward Pearce|articleurl=http://www.guardian.co.uk/theguardian/2012/mar/23/robert-giddings-obituary|articlename=Robert Giddings obituary|dated=23 March 2012|website=Guardian|accessed=30 March 2012}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=Keith Richmond|articleurl=http://www.tribunemagazine.co.uk/2012/03/robert-bob-giddings-a-tribute/|articlename=Robert “Bob” Giddings – A Tribute|dated=19 March 2012|website=[http://www.tribunemagazine.co.uk/ TribuneMagazine.co.uk]|accessed=30 March 2012}}</ref>
